Pre-Game Insights: India men's football team will be taking on Mauritius in the opening match of Inter-Continetal Cup on Tuesday in Hyderabad.
The Indian senior men's team is coming to the Telangana capital for the first time in 16 years as the city plays host to Mauritius and Syria from September 3 to 9.
The coach has termed the tournament a dress rehearsal for bigger tasks ahead -- AFC Asian Cup Qualifiers.
Chinglensana Singh Konsham and Yasir Mohammad are back for the first time since last year's Tri-Nation Series triumph.

Defenders Asish Rai and Roshan Singh Naorem return after almost an year-long hiatus, while Kiyan Nassiri Giri, Lalthathanga Khawlhring and Prabhsukhan Singh Gill will be eyeing their senior India debut.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The India vs Mauritius Inter-Continental Cup match will be played at the GMC Balayogi Athletic Stadium in Hyderabad.
The India vs Mauritius Inter-Continental Cup match will start at 7:30 PM IST.
The India vs Mauritius Inter-Continental Cup match will be telecast on Sports 18.
The India vs Mauritius Inter-Continental Cup match will be live streamed on Jio Cinema app and website.
Others: India will look to start from scratch under new head coach Manolo Marquez.
